data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Faden, Robert B. (2011): A third species of Polyspatha, an Africanendemic genus of Commelinaceae. PhytoKeys 3: 9-20, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.3.1181, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.3.1181
